title: Ninja champion advice?
body: I'm going to play a bunch of ninjas this season, shen, zed, akali and kennen. Any advice on any of them? I'm fairly new to all except zed. Shen is basicly a tank so I don't think there is a lot to figure out, but akali and kennen have a bit more to them. Anything from laning to build advice is welcome and of course skin choice. Thanks for the help.
